subject: Marathon Running
lead_paragraph: Michael Kipyego of Kenya surged ahead of Haile Gebrselassie, the former world record-holder, with two and a half miles left to win the Tokyo Marathon in 2 hours 7 minutes 37 seconds.
snippet: Michael Kipyego of Kenya surged ahead of Haile Gebrselassie, the former world record-holder, with two and a half miles left to win the Tokyo Marathon in 2 hours 7 minutes 37 seconds.
